title: Should I stop majoring in food science if I'm bad at chemistry? - Quora

response.answer_text: No.  Do your best and you will be fine.  You should only stop majoring in food science if you don't like food science.  I had a couple struggles in my pursuit of winemaking (namely O chem and Bio chem).  I passed but only cracked the 50 percentile in the classes (I blame all the damned premed students).  I went on to become a very good winemaker.  Don't sweat it.
